: : Darkangel/SharpClaws : :

Darkangel stays close to Dreadplague, whispering.

Darkangel: I think his mental components are shorting out. I thought 
we wanted Hydras dead. Does he think it'll cost us to much to 
continue this?

SharpClaws calms down and remains silent as he was told.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael: Now we can talk. As I said, this might not please you very 
> much, but neither am I hot to the idea. I was sent here to get you, 
> alive or dead. What I suggest is that you leave, in exile. You can 
> still have contacts with your crew, which I do not necessarily wish 
> to see evicted, but the main thing is that you are not on Earth 
> anymore. We will not chase you or anything, unless you come back. 
If 
> you wish, you can negotiate to accomodate yourself.
> 
> Dreadplague looked at Tyrael with a struck air, then at Darkangel. 
> Her voice came out so low that only her fellow warrior could hear 
her.
> 
> Dread: Is he crazy? What is he doing?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras:
> > 
> > "Calm down, sharpclaws, I have my reasons"
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > > OOC: I'm back!
> > > 
> > > : : Darkangel/Wolfenstein/SharpClaws/Kup : :
> > > 
> > > Darkangel, Wolfenstein and SharpClaws all stop fighting and 
stand 
> > by 
> > > their respective commanders. Wolf and Claws are somewhat 
damaged 
> > but 
> > > look strong. Darkangel has severe damge done to his 
exostructure.
> > > 
> > > SharpClaws: Why stand down, Hydras? They attacked us, we should 
> > > destroy them!
> > > 
> > > On the outskirts of the battlefield, Kup waits in truck mode. 
He 
> > > waits to see the results of Azure's actions.
